Build And Install PaddlePaddle¶

Install PaddlePaddle¶

Build from Source¶

If you want to hack and contribute PaddlePaddle source code, following guides can help you:

  • Build and Install
    • Requirement
      • Dependents
      • Optional
    • Building on Ubuntu14.04
      • Install Dependencies
      • Build and Install
  • Contribute to PaddlePaddle
    • Code Requirements
    • Creating a Fork
    • Clone
    • Commit
    • Keeping Fork Up to Date
    • Push to GitHub
    • Pull Request

Docker and Debian Package installation¶

Note: The installation packages are still in pre-release state and your experience of installation may not be smooth.

If you want to pack docker image, the following guide can help you:

  • Docker installation guide
    • Docker installation
      • PaddlePaddle Docker images
      • Download and Run Docker images
      • Notice
        • Performance
        • Remote access
  • Debian Package installation guide
    • Debian Package installation
